This project is expected to strengthen the partnership between Korea and Kenya, promote IT and digital media industry development in Kenya by developing the #KonzaDigitalMediaCity and increase chances for the Korean SMEs to invest in the Kenyan market. https://t.co/zBCAcXNLlD

The #KonzaDigitalMediaCity will also include the following: 
- Film and media campus
- Animation and Computer gaming industries
- Specialized photography and filming facilities
- Modern sound production studios and film labs
- Sound design studios and color correction facilities

Upon full implementation, the #KonzaMediaDigitalCity will host the following segments: 
- Office space hosting media and entertainment agencies
- World class film and music production labs/studios
- Production labs/studios for Photography, Advertisements, Cinema and TV Industry https://t.co/L7XhGH2ISU

Eng. John Tanui, the CEO of @konzatech takes the participants through the progress made so far in the establishment of the Digital Media City and the future plans for the project. https://t.co/lXkqQN6fIB

The #KonzaDigitalMediaCity is proposed to be a place where creative talent in the media and entertainment sector (interested in media, film, communication, broadcasting etc) will be nurtured and supported through a robust smart city environment.
The scope of this project will include policy recommendations for the development of a Master Plan and an Implementation Strategy of the #KonzaDigitalMediaCity https://t.co/X5UgneH4F0

The Konza Innovation Ecosystem is being built on the following:
A - Strategic Growth Clusters: ICT, Life Sciences and Engineering. 
B -  Activities at Konza: Research & Development, Education and Commercial Development.
